name: Winter waR 2050
description:
Winter War is an open-world multiplayer game.

The game takes place in December 2050, in the former city of Izhevsk. The main character is one of the survivors trying to figure out what happened to the world. The plot unfolds independently of other players, but they can interact with the main character.

You cannot play the beta online and interact with certain items. There may be errors and failures. We will try to fix it as soon as possible!

Updates will be released every 5 days

Version: beta 0.1

minimum system requirements:

Processor: Intel Core I5-3300 @ 3.0GHz

RAM: 2Gb

OS: windows 10 32-bit

video card: any

screen: 1366x768
